name: Feline Valley - A RPG cat game
name_original: Feline Valley - A RPG cat game
description:
Feline Valley is small game about a cat exploring through biomes and forests. This game was made for fun and not going to have a ton of features!

Controls

Attack: X

Hold 1: Sprint

Arrow Keys for movement

S to save your game

Space to add fish to your sellable fish collection (make sure you are touching the fish)
